name: rock-smash
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A rock-crushing attack that may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: A rock-crushing attack that may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: An attack that may also cut DEFENSE. It can also smash cracked boulders.
